data.text:
How to contact the Bay Area News Group

Main phone numbers and addresses

The Mercury News: 408-920-5000 (voice)

75 E. Santa Clara Street

Suite 1100

San Jose, CA 95113

East Bay Times: 925-935-2525

208 Lindbergh Avenue

Livermore, CA 94551-9512

Newspaper and digital subscriptions customer service:

To report a Mercury News delivery issue, make a payment, place a vacation hold, or make a change to your subscription, please contact our Subscriber Services department at 408-508-5554 or online via the My Account site.

Customer Service Hours:

Monday through Friday: 6:30a.m. – 5:00p.m.

Saturday: 7:00a.m. – 10:30a.m.

Sunday: 8:00a.m. – 10:30a.m.

Subscription Terms:

All Access & Print per week:

$45.00 for 7-day

$19.50 for 4-day (Thursday through Sunday)

$10.90 for Sunday

$8.50 for Digital

Print & Basic Digital per week:

$44.90 for 7-day

$19.40 for 4-day (Thursday through Sunday)

$10.80 for Sunday

Print only per week:

$44.75 for 7-day

$19.25 for 4-day (Thursday through Sunday)

$10.65 for Sunday

Arbitration and Refund policy

The Mercury News:

Didn’t get your Mercury News or experiencing other print circulation or digital subscription issues? Call 408-508-5554 or manage your Mercury News subscription — including billing, vacation holds and more — on the My Account site.

Lost your Mercury News account password? Reset it here.

View today’s digital replica, The Mercury News e-Edition

Having trouble with your unlimited digital access? Read our FAQ here, or email us with details of the issue you encountered, the device and the browser you were using. For other feedback on our websites and mobile apps, email us here.

Subscribe to The Mercury News

East Bay Times:

Didn’t get your East Bay Times or experiencing other print circulation or digital subscription issues? Call 925-276-9254 or manage your East Bay Times subscription — including billing, vacation holds and more — on the My Account site.

Lost your East Bay Times account password? Reset it here.

View today’s digital replica, East Bay Times e-Edition

Having trouble with your unlimited digital access? Read our FAQ here, or email us with details of the issue you encountered, the device and the browser you were using. For other feedback on our websites and mobile apps, email us here.

Subscribe to East Bay Times

Digital and print advertising:

Want to place an ad in one of our regional daily or local weekly newspapers, or on our websites and mobile apps?

Contact us at BayAreaNewsGroup.com/Contact-Us

Information at BayAreaNewsGroup.com

Interested in our advanced digital marketing services?

Information at BayAreaNewsGroup.com/Digital-Solutions

Direct advertising links:

To place an obituary go to our self-service obituary site here. For additional information, call us at 408-920-5276

To place a classified ad give us a call at 408-920-5111. For additional information email us at classads@bayareanewsgroup.com.

To place a legal notice or for more information on legal advertising information email us at LegalAds@BayAreaNewsGroup.com

To see Mercury News newspaper ads go here.

To see East Bay Times newspaper ads go here.

Reaching the newsroom:

Newsroom — 408-920-5444

News tips, local news — local@bayareanewsgroup.com

Sports — sports@bayareanewsgroup.com, 408-920-5830

Photo reprints — photovideodesk@bayareanewsgroup.com

Bay Area regional and local news:

Alert us to urgent breaking Bay Area news breakingteam(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

Suggest a local news story for MercuryNews.com, SiliconValley.com and The Mercury News local(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

Suggest a local news story for EastBayTimes.com and the East Bay Times local(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

Suggest a local news story for the Silicon Valley Community News weeklies local(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

Business and technology news:

Suggest a business or technology story business(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

Sports news:

Suggest a sports story sports(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

Entertainment and lifestyle news:

Suggest an entertainment or lifestyle story features(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

Editorials, opinion & letters to the editor:

Submissions must include your name, telephone number and address. Only the name is published.

Submit a letter to the Mercury News editorial page click here.

Submit a letter to the East Bay Times editorial page click here.

Corrections:

If you believe we made an error in The Mercury News let us know corrections(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

If you believe we made an error in the East Bay Times let us know corrections(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

If you believe we made an error in a Silicon Valley Community Newspapers publication let us know corrections(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

Website and mobile app feedback:

If you have feedback on our e-edition digital replica newspaper website or mobile apps let us know subscriberservices(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

If you have feedback on this website or one of our mobile news apps let us know webfeedback(at)bayareanewsgroup.com

Executives

Sharon Ryan, President and Publisher – Responsible for all aspects of the Bay Area News Group

Michael Turpin, Executive Vice President/Chief Revenue Officer – Responsible for retail and classified advertising – 408-920-5455

Frank Pine, Executive Editor – Responsible for all news coverage – 408-920-5456

Sarah Dussault, Senior Editor – Responsible for Bay Area and statewide news coverage – 408-920-5307

Jodie DeJonge, Managing Editor – Content – Responsible for news content – 408-920-5336

Gabriel Sama, Managing Editor – Audience – Responsible for digital news content and platforms – 408-271-3747

News Executives/Department Heads

Frank Pine, Executive Editor – 408-920-5456

Steve Palopoli, Assistant Managing Editor – Metro

Michael Nowels, Sports Editor – 408-920-5830

Jackie Burrell, Features Editor – 925-977-8568

Dan Borenstein, Opinion Editor – 925-943-8248
